ClientConnectionController - Class in control
ClientConnectionController create instance to client, and presave into ClientController with static variable for communication later with the GUI and clients.
ClientConnectionController(String, int) - Constructor for class control.ClientConnectionController
ClientConnectionController constructor initialize the hostname, and then the port for establish connection to server. it also open new connection physically for it.
ClientController - Class in control
ClientController called by the GUI, create this instance and then manage "menu" of events because this controlled registered as handler of all triggers.
ClientController() - Constructor for class control.ClientController
 
ClientUI - Class in boundry

ConnectionToClient - Class in ocsf.server
